login.title: Telegram Login
login.subtitle: Connect to your Telegram account
login.getApiCredentialsDescription: Visit my.telegram.org to create an app and get API ID and Hash
login.savedCredentialsDescription: You can use saved credentials or re-enter them
login.phoneVerificationDescription: Select country/region and enter your phone number, we will send a verification code
login.verificationCodeSentDescription: Verification code has been sent to
login.twoStepRequiredDescription: Your account has two-step verification enabled, please enter your password
login.tokenLoginDescription: Quick Login with Saved Session Token
login.tokenExplanation: Token is a session string generated when you logged in before, which can be used to quickly re-login without re-verifying your phone number

errors.codeExpired: Verification code has expired, please resend
errors.codeInvalidRetry: Invalid verification code, please check and try again

download.title: Download Configuration
download.subtitle: Configure your download options
download.selectDialogPrompt: Please select a dialog from the left list to start configuring downloads
download.startMessageIdPlaceholder: Leave empty to download all messages
download.endMessageIdPlaceholder: Leave empty to download to latest
download.filenameFilterHelp: Set filename filter conditions. Leave empty to download all files.
download.filenameFilterExample: Example: Enter "photo" to include or exclude related files based on mode
download.filenameFilterHelpInclude: Only download files whose filename or message text contains the specified keywords.
download.filenameFilterHelpExclude: Exclude files whose filename or message text contains the specified keywords, download others.
download.filenameFilterExampleInclude: Example: Enter "photo" to only download files containing "photo"
download.filenameFilterExampleExclude: Example: Enter "photo" to exclude files containing "photo"
download.fileSizeFilterHelp: Set file size filter range (unit: KB). Only filling minimum means downloading files larger than this value, only filling maximum means downloading files smaller than this value, filling both means downloading files within this range.
download.fileSizeFilterExample: Example: Min 100KB Max 10240KB (10MB) means downloading files in the 100KB-10MB range

record.title: Download Record
record.subtitle: Historical download information for this channel

structure.title: Directory Structure Preview
structure.jsonFolder: JSON data files (500 messages per file)

errors.typesRequired: Please select at least one download type

common.tokenDescription: You can save this token for quick login next time
common.tokenSecurityMessage: Please keep your token safe and do not share it with others. Token is equivalent to your login credentials.
common.tokenUnavailableMessage: Current session may not be fully established, please log in again
